>
[Striking Retribution](/Feats.aspx?ID=2301) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have an appropriately intense hatred for [alghollthus](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1). You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against creatures from the alghollthu family and those that serve alghollthus (the GM determines which creatures serve an alghollthu). In addition, if an alghollthu successfully affects you or one of your allies within 60 feet with an [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), your circumstance bonus to damage against that alghollthu increases to +4 for 1 minute.
name: Striking Retribution
